name: Send SMS from new Google Forms responses with D7SMS
description:
Every time someone fills out your Google Form, Make will automatically send a personalized SMS with D7SMS. 
The template uses [this model](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSegovAprIIkm19PW0l1zrycFcgRVu5ZjTyR58MLm2ahcSoW-g/viewform) from Google Forms.
